System Data Structures

Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:
AssertionA helper class for performing runtime assertions
FileRepresents a file and allows for easy manipulation of the filesystem
FileSystemClass giving the user access to files on the computer
LoggerA logging class (what more need be said?)
LogStreamA helper class meant to aid logging
ResourceManager< Resource >Provides the base functionality for Resource caching and access
Singleton< T >A templated class meant to aid in the creation of singltons
